Description.Text:
Decorated in warm tones, the polished rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars. Upgraded rooms feature city and church views; some add private terraces. Suites come with minifridges and living areas with sofas, while upgraded suites have Jacuzzis. Apartments include separate living/dining areas and kitchenettes.
There's an airy restaurant, as well as a piano bar with regular live music. The spa area includes an indoor pool, a sauna, a hammam and a gym, and massage treatments are available. Parking is included.
